metadata.title: CVE-2020-0034 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In vp8_decode_frame of decodeframe.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to improper input validation. This could lead to remote information disclosure if error correction were turned on, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1Android ID: A-62458770

criterions.comment: libvpx package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-1').
